about_the_game:
Advent 3 Book

This Advent 3 themed book unlocks 24 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Each image celebrates the Holiday season! Santa Claus, Christmas Candy and Reindeer!

Play during the month of December to get the full Advent experience! 1 image will unlock every day between the 1st and the 24th like a true advent calendar!

Contents

The Advent 3 book unlocks the following images:

  • Day 1: Festive Characters - 147x175
  • Day 2: Candy Cane - 42x66
  • Day 3: Reindeer - 60x65
  • Day 4: Little Helper - 29x62
  • Day 5: Bauble and Holly - 100x65
  • Day 6: Red Robin - 145x190
  • Day 7: Snowglobe - 26x30
  • Day 8: Gifts - 100x40
  • Day 9: Mini Santa - 55x62
  • Day 10: Humbug - 170x185
  • Day 11: Fireplace - 60x41
  • Day 12: Nativity - 300x165
  • Day 13: Snowman - 30x50
  • Day 14: Christmas Tree - 60x60
  • Day 15: Wreath - 40x40
  • Day 16: Stuck Santa - 125x125
  • Day 17: Gingerbread House - 80x50
  • Day 18: Winter - 72x72
  • Day 19: Festive candles - 100x95
  • Day 20: Ice Skating - 210x145
  • Day 21: Stockings - 59x57
  • Day 22: Winter forest - 90x69
  • Day 23: Santa - 62x77
  • Day 24: Christmas Eve - 200x125

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Advent 3 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
